issues.title: Conservative Judicial Philosophy
issues.description: Strong supporter of conservative judicial interpretation, advocating for strict constructionist approaches to legal interpretation
issues.source: Kansas Attorney General Office official statements

issues.title: Pro-Life Stance
issues.description: Strongly opposes abortion, supports significant restrictions on reproductive rights

issues.title: Second Amendment Protection
issues.description: Supports expansive gun rights, opposes gun control legislation, advocates for constitutional carry
issues.source: NRA ratings and legislative voting history

issues.title: Tax Reduction Policy
issues.description: Advocates for lower taxes, reduced government spending, and business-friendly economic policies

issues.title: Border Security
issues.description: Supports strict immigration enforcement, opposes sanctuary policies, advocates for enhanced border control

issues.title: Education Reform
issues.description: Supports school choice, charter school expansion, and conservative curriculum standards

issues.title: Healthcare Limited Government
issues.description: Opposes expanded government healthcare, supports market-based healthcare solutions

donors.data_source: Kansas Secretary of State Campaign Finance Records
